title: Earthian, Volume 3
description: The secrets of the Black Cancer, and the angels' long-time examination of the Earthian finally come to light, and the consequences are not what anyone ever expected. Chihaya is distraught when he discovers just what Michael has been hiding from him, and becomes withdrawn. But in the end, the consequences of his relationship with Kagetsuya may prove to be even more disturbing. The angels prepare to invade Earth while Elvira and her cohort of Black Angels ready their defenses, and Chihaya and Kagetsuya must finally decide where their loyalty lies, and if it even lies with each other anymore!
author: Yun Kouga
